info.name: Food App API
info.description: This collection contains the endpoints for the fullstack labs test app food api

request.description:
Authenticates an existing user and returns a JWT.

- **Body (JSON)**
    
    - `email` (string)
        
    - `password` (string)
        
- **Responses**
    
    - **200 OK** – `{ success: true, token: "" }`
        
    - **401 Unauthorized** – Invalid credentials

Registers a new user.

- **Body (JSON)**
    
    - `name` (string) – User’s full name
        
    - `email` (string) – Valid, unique email
        
    - `password` (string) – Minimum 8 characters
        
- **Responses**
    
    - **201 Created** – `{ success: true, token:` "" `}`
        
    - **401 Unauthorized** – User already exists
        
    - **400 Bad Request** – Please enter a valid email

item.name: Food

request.description:

item.description: Includes endpoint(s) for getting food list/menu items

request.description:
This endpoint adds itemsto the user's cart

- **Responses**
    
    - **200 OK**
        

```
{
    "itemId": "688b2df96ddc54e38d84275d"
}

 ```

This endpoint removes item from the user's cart

- **Responses**
    
    - **200 OK**
        

```
{
    "itemId": "688b2df96ddc54e38d84275d"
}

 ```

item.name: Order
